text: Fausto dos Santos (28 January 1905 – 28 March 1939) is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. He died at the age of 34 of tuberculosis. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (2): :Vasco da Gama: 1929, 1934 * Copa Catalunya (1): :Barcelona: 1932 ==Other websites== *Pelé.Net *Milton Neves * Category:1905 births Category:1939 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:FC Barcelona players Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Fausto dos Santos
